data.event: Formed in 1634 as one of the eight original shires (counties) of the Virginia Colony, York County is one of the oldest counties in the United States.

event.title: 1781 at the conclusion of the American Revolutionary War, when the patriots gained

data.event: It is the site of the last battle and surrender of British forces in 1781 at the conclusion of the American Revolutionary War, when the patriots gained independence from Great Britain.
